mapper.update: update refund_express set refund_id = #{refundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, express_company = #{expressCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, courier_number = #{courierNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, refund_id, express_company, courier_number, create_time, update_time from refund_express
